body.p: The Gentoo store has the 2004.3 release for x86 now on DVD, writes the Gentoo Weekly Newsletter this week. The "Future Zone" looks into current development of the Portage package management system. Other news in this issue: Gentoo's documentation team reports some updates, Oxford tries to get even with Cambridgesection. The press review takes a look at some publications reacting to the 2004.3 release, and of course there's the usual Bugzilla statistics, the GLSA list of the week, and tips and tricks aren't missing either.
